thread.title: Reservation deadline Tuesday for dinner theater murder mystery
thread.title_full: Reservation deadline Tuesday for dinner theater murder mystery

author: Staff
title: Reservation deadline Tuesday for dinner theater murder mystery
text:
Reservation deadline Tuesday for dinner theater murder mystery Entertainment brief Posted: October 16, 2015 - 12:01am 
The world premiere of Whitney Ryan Garrity’s comedy-thriller “A Party to Murder” will be staged as a dinner theater event at 6:30 p.m. Oct. 23 and 24 at the BackDoor Diner, 1212 Ave. K. 
The play is a sequel to the Garrity thriller “Night of the Prowler.” 
Tickets are $30 per person, and include a set dinner menu. Seating is limited, and must be reserved with a credit card. The reservations deadline is Tuesday 
Call 762-1088 for reservations. 
In the new play, mystery writer Donovan Webb hosts a party, and the guests solve a murder. When Webb himself turns up dead, the guests turn on each other. Fortunately, fellow writer and amateur sleuth Cornelia Sherwood, with her faithful secretary Eunice Sparks, have crashed the party. Cast members are: Carole Logan Carroll, Virginia Case, Andrew Gonzales, Andy Rasa, Renee Rhodes, Jeffrey Shirey and Liana Solis. TAGS:
